name: Achievers Point Knowledge Systems
overview: More students than ever before are seeking admission in institutions of higher learning abroad. The age of globalization has made the entire world a neighborhood school where a multi-cultural and diverse student community vigorously pursues knowledge. The information revolution has made this necessary to be able to compete in an increasingly demanding and dynamic professional milieu.There is a growing contingent of students studying at the best schools around the globe who will testify to the veracity of the name - Achievers Point. We offer a bouquet of services which begin right from the time when a student first decides to venture into the echelons of higher learning to finally getting him in the school of his choice. We don the mantle of admission consultants, essay editors, resume counselors and admission guides. But we are much more than just these services providers.
